javolution.xml.stream

Class NamespacesImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • javolution.xml.stream.NamespacesImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reusable, NamespaceContext

    final class NamespacesImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Reusable, NamespaceContext
    This class represents the namespaces stack while parsing.
    Version:
    3.2, April 2, 2005
    Author:
    Jean-Marie Dautelle
